welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shrewsbury, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We hope you'll take the time to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves all incoming and outgoing flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all cargo shipments and deliveries.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is designated for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Central Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
